ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) can fully cooked luncheon meat (such as SPAM®), cubed
1 (16 ounce) jar processed cheese sauce (such as Cheez Whiz®)
1 (4 ounce) jar chopped pimiento peppers with liquid
¾ cup mayonnaise-style sandwich spread with chopped sweet pickle
1 teaspoon dried parsley, or to taste

cookingTips: Mix cheese sauce and luncheon meat while warm for easier combination and spreading
Trim crusts from bread for an elegant presentation typical of tea sandwiches
Assemble sandwiches shortly before serving to prevent bread from becoming soggy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you prepare components ahead while keeping bread fresh and sandwiches easy to assemble?
